record.description: Student performs her own experiment in sound in the Physics Demonstration Laboratory, located on the fourth floor of Ryerson Physical Laboratory. This is but one of the 235 working demonstrations which visitors will be able to view during University Week.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Curling up at the edges. Photographer's stamp. Stamp: copyright/Stamp: credit line.
record.noteCopyright: "Chicago Tribune Photo: This photograph not to be delivered to any newspaper which does not offer pictures to the Associated Press."
